name: flowmazondotnetmonorepo
description: Monorepo containing a Dotnet API and a Next.js frontend

scripts.test-dotnet:test: wait 5000 && echo DOTNET tests watch - starting test run && dotnet build ./flowmazonbackend/flowmazonapi.UnitTests/flowmazonapi.UnitTests.csproj && dotnet build ./flowmazonbackend/flowmazonapi.IntegrationTests/flowmazonapi.IntegrationTests.csproj && (concurrently --names "UNIT,INTEGRATION" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "dotnet test ./flowmazonbackend/flowmazonapi.UnitTests/flowmazonapi.UnitTests.csproj --no-build" "dotnet test ./flowmazonbackend/flowmazonapi.IntegrationTests/flowmazonapi.IntegrationTests.csproj --no-build") && echo DOTNET tests watch - test run finished || echo DOTNET tests watch - test run finished
